settings.title: About Us
settings.bodycopy: To us, Bask is an entity more than a lovechild. It was born of both a love of all things sleek and beautiful, as well as nature's earthly gifts, but we no longer see those things as mutually exclusive. To us, truly gorgeous living is not serendipitous. It's not bestowed upon the rich and the beautiful, the ones with good taste, or those with access to excess. It comes from respecting our planet, and making conscientious choices with every single thing that we do, consume, make, or share.
settings.bodycopy_2: We center around objects. Both form and function are in the foreground. They can take up space, they can lay to waste, but that's where we made the shift. We are a marketplace for gratifyingly lovely, yet serviceable items crafted with intention.

settings.title: The only way to move forward on planet Earth is to do so sustainably; we truly believe this, and so lays the foundation for our entire concept.
Reduce
settings.description: We believe we don't need more items, we need fewer, yet high quality pieces.

settings.title: Reuse
settings.description: Nothing we offer is meant to be disposed of after a short life.

settings.title: Recycle
settings.description: We rely on either planet-friendly biodegradable materials, or those that can easily be repurposed, no confusion on our labels

settings.text: Each item's loving purpose is both with the users' and our environment's best interest in mind.
We pour thoughtful energy into every corner of our experience to make prudent shopping easier. Striking and timeless, just like Mother Nature herself.
